channel.title: Concepts on Backup your Kubernetes Stateful Applications
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Backup your Kubernetes Stateful Applications

item.title: Concepts | Stash
item.description: Concepts Concepts help you to learn about the different parts of the Stash and the abstractions it uses. This concept section is divided into the following modules: What is Stash? Overview provides an introduction to Stash. It also give an overview of the features it provides. Architecture provides a visual representation of Stash architecture. It also provides a brief overview of the components it uses. Declarative API
